data.description:
Free To Play version of Grapple Tournament.

Join our Discord for community events: https://discord.gg/A4fUKDC

Grapple. Shoot. Score. Master the vertical combat.

Grapple Tournament is an arcade shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You can enjoy complete 3D movement freedom by running, double jumping, wall jumping, climbing and using your grappling hook in an alluring stylized world.

Fight with more than 15 multifunctional weapons. Plasma pistols, revolvers, energy rifles, shotguns and rocket launchers await your command. Use them in one hand, two handed (with secondary fire) or dual wield for increased damage. If all else fails you always have your energy blade and bow on your side.

What is your take? Mobility or firepower?

Play multiplayer matches solo or with your friends. Party up and fight in various game modes on maps that were created with verticality in mind. Against players or bots.

To prepare for battle, practice in the firing range and drone challenges, and equip customizations and more.

Update 46

New:
- Added Server Browser
- Added more than 100 new items, weapon skins, Monuments, Grapple Hooks and more
- Added a new Mythic Grapple Hook. Trust me, it's mighty.
- Added campfires to King of the Chill mode
- Added item previews for most of the items in the Shop

Changes/Improvements:

Optimizations:
- Optimized the file size of item icons reducing the overall game size

Update 45

New:
- Added new game mode: King of the Chill (Alpha), a social mode without combat (where everyone is on the same team) and without bots, but you still get some XP for participating. Use this mode to teach each other, learn maps, practice your moves in peace or just hang out with your friends. Enjoy! 
- Added weapon fire prevention when weapon is inside world geometry
- Enabled 120Hz refresh rate on Meta Quest 2 and above (experimental)

Changes / Improvements:
- Updated Leaderboards to show seasonal and weekly toplists
- Improved some preview images

Fixes:
- Fixed several colliders on Icebreaker

Greetings, Champions,

Update 39 arriving!

New:
- Daily Offers have discounts now!
- Reworked the main game start screen to include Training, Multiplayer and Play against AI in one place
- Battle Pass permanently displayed in the HUB
- Added shortcut button from options/game to loadout hand customizations

Changes/Improvements:
- Made the purchase flow smoother for all items

- Nerfed Neo SMG single handed and dual wield damage
- Improved Laser Beamer with better targeting, and not healing in mutant
- Improved the shop UI to be more pleasant for the eye

Fixes:

- Fixed not displaying already owned items for purchase confirm

Enjoy!

Greetings, Champions!

Prepare fully for Halloween with this update.

New:
- Added Item Shop with all the purchasable items (STORE / SHOP tab)

Fixes:
- Fixed a bug that prevented unlocking the Premium Battle Pass

Hint:
There are some seasonal items that can only be purchased in the SHOP. Can you find them all? ;)

Enjoy!

Get ready to be spooked, Champions!

Season 1 - Halloween is here and starting!
This update brings tons of new cosmetic items and game improvements!

New:
- Added new seasonal weapon skins, grappling hook skins, hats, armor paints and more
- Added Battle Pass (season pass) with free and premium tiers
- Play multiplayer matches to get XP and to gain levels to the Battle Pass. Each level unlocks new items!
- The Premium Battle Pass can be purchased in the shop and it grants more than double the items during the season
- Added match result and XP gained screen
- Added featured creator highlight in the Entry
- The HUB got Halloween themed lighting
- Default skin is randomized for new players
- Added basic username blacklist filtering on setting custom player name

Improvements and changes:
- Added higher smooth turn speeds
- Lowered the maximum levels of the microphone boost for voice chat
- Laser Beamer range nerfed
- Changed the closed graphics of the Energy Blade to better communicate when it is turned off
- Updated the voice chat plugin under the hood
- Improved the random selection on equal votes and level order in the Lobby
- Voice chat not effected by master volume, changed UI text to be more clear on what the option does

Fixes:
- Fixed voice volume zeroing on global volume change
- Fixed gaps and colliders on Spiral
- Fixed spawn points on Complex
- Fixed a lot of backend and server bugs
- Fixed file size of the saved state of the customizations
- Fixed marking seen items only if player owns them

Update 36

New:
- Added onetime redeem code support

Changes:
- Voice chat plugin updated under the hood
- Fine tuned voice chat boost values
- Lobby now starts with no default vote on game mode and map
- Complex promoted to full state, maps reordered in Lobby
- Default skin randomized for new players
- Changed Energy Blade closed mesh to better represent its state
- Laser Beamer range reduced from 22.5 meters to 19 meters
- Smooth turn speed extended to up to 1000

Fixes:
- Fixed a bug that enabled more than 6 players in one match
- Fixed some backend and retry bugs
- Fixed a bug on changing the global volume making the voice chat very quiet

Grapple Tournament is now Free-To-Play!

Since we started the transition to Free-To-Play, we can already see a growing interest for the game. New members are joining the community every day and are sending us valuable feedback on what to improve in the game. This makes us happier than ever!

Update 35: In this update we are already bringing some newly requested features!

New:
- Added deadzone settings separately for the left and right joysticks
- Opened Daily offers available for all platforms
- Credit Store made available on the Meta Quest version (work in progress on Steam)
- Added higher smooth turn speed levels

Improvements and changes:
- In the options, turning the HUD on/off will change the health and shield displays accordingly
- Changed glass visuals on Spiral to improve level design visibility
- Changed the Railgun secondary projectile graphics to increase visibility on Meta Quests

Fixes:
- Fixed some graphics issues on Spiral

What's next?
- Preview for items in the daily shop
- Season 1 starts very soon!

Send us your feedback and help us shape the game on Discord:
https://discord.gg/A4fUKDC

Thank you for supporting Grapple Tournament!
The dev team

Update 34 - Early Adopter Rewards for players who purchased the game

If you purchased Grapple Tournament (the full version previously), open the game before the 14th of September to receive your Early Adopter bundle inside the game.

The Early Adopter Bundle contains:
- The new Grapple Hat
- An exclusive skin pack for all weapons in the game
- 1200 CREDITS
- All 100+ previous items you already had

Please note that the Quest paid version will sunset on the 14th of September but the game will live on in the FREE version.
(You are on the right version here.)

New:
- Exclusive hat, a weapon skin bundle and all previous items granted for players who purchased the game previously

Fixes:
- Fixed bHaptics integration

What's next:
We are continuing the transition to free to play in priority. Read more here:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/developer-post/1010119966807411/

Update 32 - the first step towards Free-To-Play!

You can read more about the transition period on going F2P here:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/developer-post/1010119966807411/
Most importantly, if you have bought the game previously, log in at least once to get your CREDITS!

New:
- Reworked and extended the customization system
-- Redesigned the system for wearables
-- Added Armor Skin customizations, glove skin matches body skin
-- Added Grappling Hook and Cable customizations
-- Added Weapon Skins to the system, with a tons of new skins on the way
- Customization items have two background colors:
-- Blue: available in the shop
-- Purple: coming later to the shop, or in a battle pass, or some other way, or timed exclusive
- Introducing CREDIT(s) as the new ingame currency
-- You can earn CREDITs with buying the currency in the CREDIT Store
-- Soon we'll add more ways to earn CREDITS via playing the game and completing challenges
- Added CREDIT Store
-- currently only on Meta platforms
-- work in progress for Steam
- Added Daily shop for the paid version (coming soon to the free version)
-- Offering 5 purchasable items every day
-- With Reroll functionality to refresh the selection of daily offers
- New pause menu graphics design
- Added Armory in the entry HUB area to show you current loadout

Changes:
- Changed the UI in some places for better readability
- Added randomized customizations for bots
- Refined enemy coloring to look better close-up
- Complex got it's final art pass

Optimizations:
- Optimized complex UI windows in the game for performance improvements
- Removed drone customizations to gain performance in the Drone Challenge
- Removed menu coloring option to save on performance on all UI elements
- Removed some unused assets and codes from the build to save disk space

Fixes:
- Fixed weapon setup when gripping weapon on spawn (in Instagib)
- Fixed jump sound when using grappling hook after double jump
- Fixed a bug about FFA HUD not updating at game start
- Fixed spawn locations and colliders on Icebreaker
- Fixed typos in some places on UI
- Fixed a bug that showed other players' menu laser pointers

In this update, we've made significant enhancements to the underlying systems and as with any major revamp, there's potential for a few hiccups. We appreciate your patience and feedback as we fine-tune everything!

Work-in-progress and known issues:
- New UI design is not final
- Some customization item icons are not final
- Working on a preview for items in the shop
- Working on the CREDIT store functionality on Steam
- Some non-English translations might be missing
- In the weapons list you've probably noticed the new weapon, that is coming soon ;)

What's next:
We are continuing the transition to free to play in priority. 
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/developer-post/1010119966807411/

Communications and marketing around the game being available for everyone is starting. As always we'll listen to the community and will consider your feedback.

Update 32

New:
- Icebreaker level got its most anticipated graphics pass, now fully textured.
Enjoy the ice caves, explore the shipwreck while having a warm drink over some frags on this abandoned mining site. How do you like it?

Changes:
- Level design changes on Complex based on your feedback, still in Alpha

Update 31

New:
- Reworked the colors of the ingame interface to better represent what is friendly (blue) and what is enemy (red), including character highlights, health bars, player names, UI panels and gameplay elements
- Added elimination feed with proper team colors and weapon icons
- Added reworked Drone Challenge:
  - Added a completely new look and layout for the Drone Challenge to better match the quality of the game
  - Improved difficulty curve to be more dynamic and smoothly increasing in challenge
  - Improved the AI of the drones to make them more dynamic
  - Player gets shield after completing each wave (pickups removed)
- Added hit/kill indicator for bow
- Added camera fades and dynamic loading screen between levels

Changes:
- Improved the animation of drones in the Drone Challenge
- Improved Firing Range targets visibility
- Improved level design on Complex (still in Alpha)
- Improved colliders on Container
- Replaced the climbing part with double jump in the Tutorial temporarily
- Parkour level temporarily removed from the game because it isn't on par with the quality of other parts of the game

Optimizations:
- Optimized some visual elements of the drones

Fixes:
- Fixed a matchmaking bug where players got matched a second time even after already joining a match
- Fixed some colliders in the Firing Range
- Fixed pause menu to work properly when server is disconnected
- Fixed translations on some texts
- Fixed smooth turn speed on reset to match default value
- Fixed character overflow on player names above health bars
- Fixed wall colliders on Temple
- Fixed Grenade pistol ammo display

Greetings, champions!

Update 30 is live!

We've added a long awaited feature: the Firing Range. In the Firing Range you can practice your shooting, play multiple minigames and try out all the weapons at your own pace.

New:
- Added Firing Range with multiple minigame modes:
  - Static Practice: Try out all the weapons in the game in a safe environment at your leisure
  - Reflex Practice: Try to hit the active target with any weapon
  - Headshot Practice: Deliver as many headshots as you can in the given time
  - Practice Dummy placed in the Firing Range
  - With a friendly NPC companion

Changes:
- Removed winter seasonal decorations from the game
- Practice Range repurposed to Drone Challenge
- Practice Dummy moved to the Firing Range from the Drone Challenge
- Improved color space for the whole game

Optimizations:
- Optimized grappling hook and bow materials

Fixes:
- Fixed Oculus PC startup crash
- Fixed rockets in Rocket Launcher to match the current game state and graphics fidelity
- Fixed Railgun tutorial step not registering damage
- Fixed hit indicator on headshots
